alert.note: Alert for Hill; Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:03PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Liberty and northwestern Hill Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 503 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles northwest of Joplin, or 27 miles north of Chester, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Liberty and northwestern Hill Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for north central Montana.
